<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wizard Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5106) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=115" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 223 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Wizard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=218)

**Prerequisites**
Intelligence +2

</column>

---

You cast spells like a wizard, gaining a spellbook with four common arcane cantrips of your choice. You gain the [Cast a Spell](/Actions.aspx?ID=2718) activity. You can prepare two cantrips each day from your spellbook. You’re trained in the spell attack modifier and spell DC statistics. Your key spellcasting attribute for wizard archetype spells is Intelligence, and they are arcane wizard spells. You become trained in Arcana; if you were already trained in Arcana, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice. Select a school; you don’t gain any abilities from your choice of school, but qualify for feats as a member.

<title level="2">Wizard Dedication leads to...</title>
[Arcane School Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=5107), [Basic Arcana](/Feats.aspx?ID=5108), [Basic Wizard Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=5109)
name: Wizard Dedication
